issue.title: Defect in atomic wording

blockquote.p: Requires: The order argument shall not be memory_order_acquire nor memory_order_acq_rel.

discussion.p: I believe that this should state
discussion.blockquote: ... When only one memory_order argument is supplied, the value of success is order, and the value of failure is order except that a value of memory_order_acq_rel shall be replaced by the value memory_order_require ...
shall be replaced by the value memory_order_acquire ...

blockquote.p: Requires: The order argument shall not be memory_order_acquire memory_order_release nor memory_order_acq_rel.

resolution.blockquote: ... When only one memory_order argument is supplied, the value of success is order, and the value of failure is order except that a value of memory_order_acq_rel shall be replaced by the value memory_order_require memory_order_acquire ...

issue.rationale: Already fixed by the time the LWG processed it.
